info.name: CoinMarketCap Dark Theme
info.description:
A darker/grunge overhaul of the very popular CoinMarketCap.com.

Want to contribute? Submit a Pull Request on GitHub: https://github.com/jaaneh/CoinMarketCap-Dark-Theme
info.additionalInfo:
March 27th, 2019
- Added dark theme to new navbar classes.

December 1st, 2018
- Added dark theme to new "Newsletter" section.

November 8th, 2018
- Fixed some focus and hover colors.

November 7th, 2018
- Added dark theme to new "Related Cryptocurrencies" section.

As always, if you find anything that needs fixing, please open an issue https://github.com/jaaneh/CoinMarketCap-Dark-Theme

October 16th, 2018
- Added dark theme to new Buy, Trade, Get Wallet and Get Loan buttons.
- Added dark theme to Share and Watch buttons.
- Fixed some hover and focus colors.

If you spot something that needs fixing, please open an issue https://github.com/jaaneh/CoinMarketCap-Dark-Theme

August 18th, 2018
- Fixed menu focus color.

July 12th, 2018
- Fixed CMC logo appearing in black instead of white/gray.

July 1st, 2018
- Fixed "Share" and "Favorite" icon colors.
- Fixed"Share" and "Favorite" background colors.
- Lowered line height from 30px to 20px where links to Website, Explorer, Source Code, etc are.
- Lowered padding on Rank, Mineable, Coin, and Token labels.

June 13th, 2018 - v2.0
- Additional fixes to CMCs many new updates which broke the theme.
- Start removing unused code.
    - I will be continuing to clean out the code in the coming days.

June 13th, 2018
- Completely re-done parts of the style for the new CoinMarketCap updates that broke it.

I will be continuing to update the style asap. 
I will also be completely re-coding the design to get rid of unnecessary code at a later date.

June 1st, 2018
- Added cleaner style to currency widgets.

May 24th, 2018
- Fixed white navbar background color.
- Removed global stats border shadow.
- Fixed "Share this page" and "Add to Watchlist" button colors.

May 11th, 2018
- Fixed a button hover color.
- Fixed currency button background and hover color. 
- Fixed button moving a few pixels when hovering it.
- Fixed hover colors for language and currency buttons top right of page.
- Added somewhat viable support for smaller screens, will work on this.

May 10th, 2018
- Fixed a white row color that appeared on home page.

May 4th, 2018
- Fixed colors for "Night Mode" buttons on bottom of the page.
- Fixed color of CMC logo at bottom of the page.
- Added theme colors to "Share" and "Add to Watchlist" buttons.

May 2nd, 2018
- Fixed colors for the new CMC look.
    - If I missed anything, please submit an issue on GitHub.

April 27th, 2018
- Fixed more white row colors.

April 21st, 2018
- Remove a new white border that was added to all tables.

April 20th, 2018
- Additional fixes for white row colors.
- Added dark theme to the Currency Converter Calculator.

April 19th, 2018
- Fixed divider color on dropdown menus.
- Fixed focus color on dropdown menus.
- Fixed button text hover color.

April 11th, 2018
- Added fix for white colored row after a CMC update.

February 5th, 2018
- Added fix for black box that would display randomly at top of page.

January 22th, 2018
- Added additional width to the "Added" column on Recently Added coins page to prevent text using 2 lines.

January 18th, 2018
- Changed some text color for better visibility.

January 14th, 2018
- Extended width to the "Added" column on Recently Added coins page to prevent text using 2 lines.

January 11th, 2018
- Changed color for dropdown menu hover.
- Changed color for hover and focus on some text.
- Fixed a coloring issue that would appear when one tab is hovered while another is in focus.

January 5th, 2018
- Change sparkline color to enhance visibility.
- Fixed issue where some coins would display with a white background on https://coinmarketcap.com/tokens/views/all/.
- Added correct color displays to the /coins/views/all/ and /tokens/views/all/ page.
- Fixed issue where the currency switch button would display a blue color on hover.
- Fixed white background on hover of Charts, Markets, Social, Tools, and Historical Data tabs.
